name: panGEMic
description: Collect all the gems while avoiding enemies and hazards, do it in the time limit or face the 'Red Skull'. panGEMic is a retro inspired platform game requiring quick reflexes and quick thinking.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 20 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD, Geforce 650, AMD R5 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 20 MB available space
